remarks: The symbol at index (n-1) of a word of length n (not 0) cyclically shifted by N positions (not 0) is the symbol at index (N-1) of the original word. (Contributed by AV, 18-May-2018.)  (Revised by AV, 21-May-2018.)  (Revised by AV, 30-Oct-2018.)
statement: cshwidxn $p |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ( 1 ... ( # ` W ) ) ) -> ( ( W cyclShift N ) ` ( ( # ` W ) - 1 ) ) = ( W ` ( N - 1 ) ) ) $.
